effect.short: Copies the user's ability onto the target.
effect.full: Changes the target's ability to match the user's.  This effect ends when the target leaves battle.

flavorTexts.text:
The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels
the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability
the same as the user’s.
